text: hello this is Bill Cunningham in New
York City in the middle of August and
one of the fascinating features of
fashion on the street are the new
generation of young men there is no way
anyone is going to get them back into
the corral of dressing as manufacturers
would like them to dress they dress to
their own drum beat and it's fantastic
when you look at it over this this is a
composite of July and August and it's
just amazing to see often the same men
going to work on different days and how
they interchange the jackets with the
ties that match don't match the trousers
there's one young man here he had a
three-piece suit one day the whole suit
the next day just the trousers the next
day the trousers worn with a sweater and
Assurant the next day a short sleeve
shirt opened at the neck and the shirt
tails out over the trousers this young
man who is in the real estate business
here we've seen him for a couple of
years and his really punctilious style
of dress is is just amazing the winds
are not of his ties the caller's
everything each day to perfection and
always a little boutonniere and a live
one not a fake one
it's it's absolutely marvelous the way
men have rid themselves of a confined
way of dress and they now are putting
themselves together the way they want
now obviously in people in independent
businesses and the casual wear speaks
very loud because they have the freedom
to dress as they wish these young
fellows have
and the strings of what is acceptable
and even in evening wear look at the man
that experimented with a jacket with the
sleeves a halfway cut open to the elbow
I just thought it was worth you're
seeing on this revolution if you will
that's happening in menswear
